description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of a roof terrace  to rear outrigger.
decision_conditions: The proposed roof terrace with associated balustrade, by reason that it would be contrary to the existing pattern of development found within the area, and would have a detrimental impact on the visual appearance of the host property and the character of the surrounding area by virtue of their position, scale and materials proposed. As such the proposal would be contrary to section 7 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2012), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 of Ealing's Adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (2012), and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Development Management, Development Plan Document (2013).
